data.name: Wisper
data.detailed_description:
The world of Wisper


Since the beginning, wisps have been around. As beings from out of this world, their behavior and purpose is unknown to most.
That's where Wispers come in, whose function is to understand and deal with wisps.

The Wispling


As a Wisper, learn and track wisps during your journey. As peaceful as it seems, it won’t always be that way as you follow a Wispling, the greatest type of wisp you will ever face. Save villages from the corruption and its evil wisp.

Key features

  • A learning journey



Follow the adventure of an in-training Wisper tracking the appearance of an “evil wisp”.

  • The wisps
Magical creatures who came from another world, each one has a way to affect their surroundings. Their visuals and power varies. When they are affected by bad feelings or human behavior they will start to become an “evil wisp”. Their body will start becoming corrupted, will lose control and destroy things or worse, hurt people.

  • A relaxing open world



Wisper’s world is set in a steampunk open world where people have lived since the beginning of the wisps. Explore a world scarred by evil wisps’ action and meet unique people.

  • Tools to explore the open world
Use all your range of tools to make your hiking easier in this steampunk world. Wall jump with your pickaxe, reach higher places by grabbing trees with your hook, do tricks with your skate and travel the map faster.

  • Keep track of everything in your notebook
As an aspirant Wisper it’s important to keep track of every new information! Your notebook will register the wisps that you find and interact with along with their visuals and a behavior’s explanation.

Will you find the Wispling and get rid of the corruption?

data.short_description: Walk through a beautiful steampunk open world filled with magical creatures, peoples and their secrets. Learn about them and the world they live in. Save villages from corruption on your journey to become a Wisper.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bits
  • Processor: 4 cores 3.4 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bits
  • Processor: 4 cores 3.4 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
